channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiClientWindows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiClientWindows

item.title: CVE-2022-40681|2024-08-03T12:21:46.507Z -- fortinet -- forticlientwindows
item.description: A incorrect authorization in Fortinet FortiClient (Windows) 7.0.0 - 7.0.7, 6.4.0 - 6.4.9, 6.2.0 - 6.2.9 and 6.0.0 - 6.0.10 allows an attacker to cause denial of service via sending a crafted request to a specific named pipe.

item.title: CVE-2022-40682|2024-08-03T12:21:46.552Z -- fortinet -- forticlientwindows
item.description: A incorrect authorization in Fortinet FortiClient (Windows) 7.0.0 - 7.0.7, 6.4.0 - 6.4.9, 6.2.0 - 6.2.9 and 6.0.0 - 6.0.10 allows an attacker to execute unauthorized code or commands via sending a crafted request to a specific named pipe.
